siteMetadata.title: Unofficial Online COVID-19 Vaccine Scheduling Instructions
siteMetadata.description: Some instructions to help folks schedule their COVID-19 vaccine.

markdownRemark.html:
Scheduling for a COVID-19 vaccine involves the following steps:

  1. Sign up for Vaccine
  2. Select Vaccination Dosage
  3. Select Vaccination Location
  4. Select Date and Time
  5. Enter Contact Details
